content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Assembling machine at position(z=63.5 y=-53.5) and inserter at position(a=64.5 y=-53.5) that puts into assembling machine
-  Beltgroup (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) that connects the furnace at position y=-80.0 to assembling machine at position(z=63.5 y=-53.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when entity is not connected to electric network
- Ensure entity is connected to electric network before attempting to use it
### Errors when entity is not fueled
- Ensure entity is fueled before attempting to use it
### Errors when entity is waiting for source items
- Ensure entity has source items before attempting to use it
### Errors when entity has no ingredients
- Ensure entity has ingredients before attempting to use it

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
